com.jacobibanez.model

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jacobibanez.model.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a graph, which is responsible for dealing with nodes and edges. This class also gives a proper interface to the user in order to make some calculations relevant to the model
    Since:
    29/09/16.
    Author:
    Jacob Ibáñez Sánchez

        public Graph()

    • Method Detail

      • addRoute

        public void addRoute(java.lang.String originName,
                     java.lang.String destinationName,
                     java.lang.Integer weight)
        Adds a new relation between two nodes to the graph. If the origin and the destination are the same, or if the weight is null, it does not add anything
        Parameters:
        originName - Name to identify the origin Node
        destinationName - Name to identify the destination Node
        weight - Weight of the relation between the nodes

      • getDistance

        public java.lang.Integer getDistance(java.lang.String... stops)
        Gets the minimum distance between two nodes, passing by all intermediate nodes if any.
        Parameters:
        stops - Ordered from oritgin to destination collection of nodes which distance we need to retrieve
        Returns:
        The total minimum distance between all nodes

      • getRoutes

        public java.util.List<Edge> getRoutes(java.lang.String originName,
                                      java.lang.String destinationName)
        Gets a collection of available routes between two nodes
        Parameters:
        originName - Name to identify the origin Node
        destinationName - Name to identify the destination Node
        Returns:
        A collection of edges

      • getShortestDistance

        public java.lang.Integer getShortestDistance(java.lang.String origin,
                                             java.lang.String destination)
        Returns the minimum distance between two nodes
        Parameters:
        origin - Name to identify the origin Node
        destination - Name to identify the destination Node
        Returns:
        Minimum distance between two nodes if any. Null otherwise

      • getDestinations

        public java.util.List<Node> getDestinations(java.lang.String originName)
        Get a collection of nodes which origin is a given node
        Parameters:
        originName - Name to identify the origin Node
        Returns:
        A collection of nodes

      • getOrigins

        public java.util.List<Node> getOrigins(java.lang.String destinationName)
        Get a collection of nodes from where you can end into the given node
        Parameters:
        destinationName - Name to identify the destination Node
        Returns:
        A collection of nodes
